channel.title: Morris Animal Refuge
channel.description: The Morris Animal Refuge is a 501(c)(3) open admission shelter dedicated to helping the homeless, abandoned and unwanted pets of the Philadelphia region. Founded in 1874 by Elizabeth Morris, we were the first organization dedicated to sheltering and rehoming pets, and continue that legacy today by providing adoptions, a low-cost spay/neuter program, fostering, humane education and more.

item.title: Orange Tag
item.description: Attach this fun yet simple tag to your pets collar to add a little color to their day. It’s the perfect purchase to complete your pets look while supporting the animals of Morris Animal Refuge!

item.title: Look. Love. Adopt. Tag
item.description: Attach this fun tag to bring style your pets collar. It’s the perfect purchase to complete your pets look while supporting the animals of Morris Animal Refuge!

item.title: Stackable Mug
item.description: Add some color to your day with the row house stackable mug! Not only is it colorful, but its shape allows for easy stacking and less clutter in your cabinets.

item.title: Tote Bag
item.description: Add this fun tote to your collection to support the animals of Morris Animal Refuge while spreading an important message!

item.title: MAR T-Shirt
item.description: Support your favorite animal refuge with this classic t-shirt, its simple style is right for everyone!

item.description: Support your favorite animal refuge with this classic t-shirt, its simple style is right for everyone!

item.title: Look. Love. Adopt. T-Shirt
item.description: Spread an important message with our baseball t-shirt! The modern design looks awesome and supports the animals of Morris Animal Refuge!

item.title: MAR Mug
item.description: Start your morning with Morris Animal Refuge by purchasing this adorable mug! The cat ears and tail are a fun addition to our classic mug.

item.title: MAR Hat
item.description: Sport this classic style while representing America’s oldest animal refuge! The animals at Morris Animal Refuge will be sure to thank you as they receive all the profits from your purchase.

item.title: Dog T-Shirt
item.description: Step up your furry friends wardrobe with our row house t-shirt which captures the history of America’s first animal refuge, Morris Animal Refuge.
